entry.title: Book: The Magician's Land, by Lev Grossman (2014) (5)
entry.content:
Book: The Magician's Land, by Lev Grossman (2014) (5)20140828
I finished this today. It was a very cool ride and I'm glad that
Quentin's story is clearly over. He really goes an amazing number
of different places throughout the books. It was very neat when he
turned into a dragon and then a god.
  • Books
  • 2014

entry.title: Movie: Tropic Thunder, starring Ben Stiller (2008)
entry.content:
Movie: Tropic Thunder, starring Ben Stiller (2008)20140827
The gore in this movie is ridiculous. Ben Stiller's blown up hands
were absurd. Yikes! The director explodes! "I don't know what it's
called; I just know the sound it makes when it takes a man's life."
Robert Downey is insane in this. Tom Cruise's part is ridiculous
too.
  • Movies
  • 2008

entry.title: Movie: Conan the Destroyer, starring Arnold Schwartzenegger (1984)
entry.content:
Movie: Conan the Destroyer, starring Arnold Schwartzenegger (1984)20140826
It is a bit annoying that everyone knows Conan's name on sight.

Drunk Conan :(

The thief friend sounds like he is dubbed in. It's very weird.

The princess was very cute.

I didn't like this one as much.
  • Movies
  • 1984

entry.title: Movie: The Amazing Spider-Man 2, starring Andrew Garfield (2014)
entry.content:
Movie: The Amazing Spider-Man 2, starring Andrew Garfield (2014)20140824
This was a very cool movie. I liked the set up of Max and how he
was unintentionally a bad guy. The interaction between Gwen and
Peter was pretty great. I like Electro as a villain and I really
liked the way the end of the movie is so open. I thought it was a
little rough how they introduced Harry, but it was okay.
  • Movies
  • 2014

entry.title: Movie: The Amazing Spider-Man, starring Andrew Garfield (2012) (3)
entry.content:
Movie: The Amazing Spider-Man, starring Andrew Garfield (2012) (3)20140824
My wife and I watched this to prep for the second one. The
chemistry between Garfield and Stone is amazing. Emma Stone is so
stylish and cute!
  • Movies
  • 2012

entry.title: Movie: Conan the Barbarian, starring Arnold Schwartzenegger (1982)
entry.content:
Movie: Conan the Barbarian, starring Arnold Schwartzenegger (1982)20140818
This is a wild movie. The world it creates is very interesting. I
like the way the magic is all strange and scary. James Earl Jones
seems like such a strange person to cast in the role though. He
looks incredibly strange sometimes, like a monkey. I think Sonja is
really awesome. Conan's origin story is so neat. I love that he
eventually pushes the mill by himself. The reaction of the people
after he kills their god is pretty intense. It's funny how little
speaking there is in the movie generally.
  • Movies
  • 1982

entry.title: Movie: 21 Jump Street, starring Channing Tatum and Jonah Hill (2012)
entry.content:
Movie: 21 Jump Street, starring Channing Tatum and Jonah Hill (2012)20140818
This movie is ridiculous in a great way. There were so many
ridiculous parts: the "Aroma of Christ Church" with "Korean Jesus";
the Captain is crazy; hitting each other with the car; "App"
chemistry; making each other throw up; Johnny Depp's
monologue. Ridiculous!
  • Movies
  • 2012

Game: Mega Man 2 (NES, 1988) (6)20140817
I played through today in an hour and forty minutes. I died twelve
times. It was a nice performance for my dad who got stuck when he
tried recently.

Game     3: 1:40

entry.title: Movie: Transcendence, starring Johnny Depp (2014)
entry.content:
Movie: Transcendence, starring Johnny Depp (2014)20140817
This was a very cool movie. I thought they messed up the end of the
movie though. They should've played up how what the "good guys" in
the movie were doing was wrong. I was also surprised that Depp
didn't immediately stop them. Finally, I thought it lame that the
movie never explained how Max was comfortable working with RIFT or
how Depp was comfortable controlling people.
  • Movies
  • 2014

entry.title: Movie: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers, directed by Peter Jackson (2002)
entry.content:
Movie: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers, directed by Peter Jackson (2002)20140816
I watched this movie in a haze of being sick while I tried to fall
asleep. I didn't see as much of this movie. I dislike a lot of
little things about this movie. I think the worst part is the
creepy makeup on Wyrmtongue and the Elvish speech---the characters
mouths look disgusting when speaking Elvish.
  • Movies
  • 2002

entry.title: Buffy & Angel - Season 6 - Episode 10 - Wrecked
entry.content:
Buffy & Angel - Season 6 - Episode 10 - Wrecked20140814
Buffy is such a jerk to Spike through most of this season. The
idea of the 'magical drug trip' is so bizarre. The conversation
at the end where Buffy compares herself to Willow is so wrong,
because Buffy isn't hurting anyone being with Spike.
  • TV Shows
  • Buffy & Angel
